minecraftProjects.title: Miniblock Traders
minecraftProjects.desc: Get over 500+ curated, unique, and decorative miniblocks from over 20+ Miniblock Traders. Survival and Creative mode friendly.

minecraftProjects.title: Warp Shrines
minecraftProjects.desc: Adds craftable, buildable Warp Shrines to the game, allowing the player to set up a vanilla, survival-friendly teleportation network.

minecraftProjects.title: City Districts
minecraftProjects.desc: Create RPG-Like titles in certain areas that show up when you walk over them. Good for roleplaying or adding a bit of extra flair to a build.

minecraftProjects.title: Immersive Atmospheres
minecraftProjects.desc: Add cool, aesthetic, and immersive atmospheric effects to your worlds! Falling snow, leaves, sandstorms, etc!

minecraftProjects.title: Beastiary
minecraftProjects.desc: When you look at a monster or creature with a Spyglass, information about it gets added to your Beastiary in the Advancements tab. Collect 'em all!

minecraftProjects.title: Illegal Water
minecraftProjects.desc: Adds a special craftable heatproof water item that lets the player create water source blocks in the Nether when tossed ontop of a Soul Campfire.

minecraftProjects.title: Babees
minecraftProjects.desc: Keep permanent baby bees! Obtain some honeycomb and toss it at a bee to make it a baby bee... permanently!

minecraftProjects.title: Hip Hoppers
minecraftProjects.desc: Obtain a rabbit's foot and toss it at a rabbit to make it a baby rabbit... permanently! Ignore the implications...

minecraftProjects.title: Rabbits To Toads
minecraftProjects.desc: Replaces the Rabbit Model with a Toad model. Changes sounds, mob and item textures, and localization for rabbit names and items.

minecraftProjects.title: Subtle Armor
minecraftProjects.desc: Updates armor to be MUCH less intrusive. Most of a skin will be visible with this on, with armor still being visible but extremely subtle.

minecraftProjects.title: Birch Tree Remover
minecraftProjects.desc: Removes birch trees from any biome that isn't a Birch Forest biome or variant thereof. Only works in newly generated chunks, not previously generated.
